TopicTitle: Remove one letter from a movie title and describe the new movie in a single line

Articles.Content: Peed: Someone is going to explode if they don't get to a toilet....
The Ego Movie: A hour-long movie about a vain person.
The Darkening (The Shining): A documentary that lasts from sunset to sunrise about how it gets so dark at night.
Zootopa, about stuff on top of a zoo.
Space Owboys: A bunch of klutzy astronauts that get into mishaps when training to go into space.
Apollo 3, a movie about a non-existent space mission.

1 hour ago, max_creative said:

Apollo 3, a movie about a non-existent space mission.

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/AS-203

On topic:

Pollo 13: A movie about 13 Mexican chefs running a restaurant famous for it's chicken dishes.

Superman's Batman: A story surrounding Superman's lesser-known time in the military, told from the perspective of the NCO assigned as his personal servant.

Spoiler

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Batman_(military)

 

XX [AKA double-X] - Vin Diesel has...like, an alright time.

 

A lie - An examination of the political manipulation and exploitation surrounding the Nostromo controversy.

Spoiler

From "Alien" if that wasn't clear
At man, about a guy named at. (Batman)
Redator: The rise and fall of Ellen Pao.
Ion man, a documentary about the man who invented ion engines.
Anchorma: The story of a single mother that becomes a news anchor.

The evil dad  : sometimes the evil is inside your house already

The words end : A documentary about the full stop.

Apocalypse no : Documenting the anti war effort during the vietnam war

Lice doesn`t live here anymore : horror story of hair care from the perspective of a louse

The God the Bad and the Ugly : A retelling of the bible in the style of a spaghetti western

Technically it's not removing a letter, but: 

Sleepless in the launch bunker by the level one launch pad.
Intertellar - where people explain the absurdity of storytelling.

Batman vs suprman.

bat man vs supperman.

Pilates of the Caribbean - Its a fitness video that takes place in a tropical island paradise with rum and a Keith Richards impersonator.

Evil Bead - A group of twenty somethings go to a cabin in the woods and discover a bead that is evil and it kills them one by one.

Donnie Dorko - A dark, abstract, brooding piece of crap about time travel, an evil bunny, and a plane crash, featuring a big Dork played by Jake Gyllenhall.

The Hurtmocker - A war film about a special forces operative who tortures terrorists by mocking them.

Avatard - A documentary about how a great director is pouring decades of his life into a so-so story when he could be doing much better things with his time.

I could keep going, but I'll just stop here for now.

 

 

Edit: Okay, just one more

Shakes on a Plane: Samuel L Jackson has had it with these mediocre milk shakes on this milkshakin' plane.

Edited April 8, 2016 by EliasDanger

Liens - Its Space Marines vs. Creditors

Fry - Brad Pit cooks frys in WWII and shia la'bouf is in it too.

T - Stephen's Kings classic horror story about a demonic clown who's missing an eye.

The T'ing - A retelling of The Thing, but set in Haiti,

Olympus Has Allen - Tim Allen is capture by Zeus, and only Gerard Butler can save him.
Star was - A film where the empire is threatened by a supernova
Harry potte - a story about a pottery making wizard that goes on an adventure inside a clay pot.
teminator- Movie about Temmie which save world from flowey
